title: Upcoming Guidance for First Lady Michelle Obama | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
December 14, 2015

 



Upcoming Guidance for First Lady Michelle Obama





In case you missed it: 


		As part of the #BetterMakeRoom campaign, the First Lady and Jay Pharoah released a music video with CollegeHumor. WATCH

		As part of the Let Girls Learn initiative, last night on Project Runway: Junior the First Lady issued a surprise challenge for the young designers in collaboration with Lands’ End. Learn more HERE. And check out the First Lady’s interview with the Financial Times HERE.


UPCOMING GUIDANCE FOR FIRST LADY MICHELLE OBAMA

Monday, December 14, 2015

*Reminder to RSVP* Washington, DC * 2:00PM ET – Continuing a tradition dating back to Bess Truman, the First Lady will visit the Children’s National Health System in Washington, DC. At the hospital, Mrs. Obama will take a tour, visit patients, and thank the Children’s staff for their work. Following the tour, she will read to children and take their questions in the hospital’s atrium.

Friday, December 18, 2015 

The White House – As part of the Joining Forces initiative, the First Lady will greet children of Gold Star families attending a special screening of Star Wars: The Force Awakens in the White House Family Theater.
